pkgmetadata.longdescription: # OARepo vocabulariesThis is an extension of invenio vocabularies that allows:* Use the vocabularies with custom fields* Treat vocabulary items as hierarchy## InstallationAdd `oarepo-runtime`, `oarepo-vocabularies` to your virtualenv an set up the following in your `invenio.cfg`:```pythonfrom oarepo_vocabularies.services.config import VocabulariesConfigfrom oarepo_vocabularies.resources.config import VocabulariesResourceConfigVOCABULARIES_SERVICE_CONFIG = VocabulariesConfigVOCABULARIES_RESOURCE_CONFIG = VocabulariesResourceConfig```## DocumentationSee [NRP documentation](https://narodni-repozitar.github.io/developer-docs/docs/technology/invenio/nrp-toolchain/plugins/vocabularies) for more details.
